content: Hi all, I am in the middle of doing a college course here in Scotland which details the experiences of wartime soldiers from Vietnam to Iraq, and would love to hear from any soldiers who may like to email a story of interest to me for publishing in my college report. I am hoping this forum may allow me to hear accounts shocking or otherwise from real soldiers with real experiences. My father served in the British RAF and I am proud of the work you all do. Thank you and God bless. Derek, Glasgow, Scotland. I can be contacted THRU MY PROFILE E-MAIL REMOVED . MAINEDAWG MODERATOR This message has been edited. Last edited by: mainedawg, Wed 25 March 2009 05:14 AM

title: War veterans required!
